sourcing.instructions: Aluminum can be sourced from metal suppliers or online retailers. Calcium can be obtained from chemical supply stores or online. Neodymium is available from rare earth suppliers. Tin can be sourced from metal suppliers or online.
steps: Aluminum can be sourced from metal suppliers or online retailers. Calcium can be obtained from chemical supply stores or online. Neodymium is available from rare earth suppliers. Tin can be sourced from metal suppliers or online.
1. Measure and weigh each ingredient precisely using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure and weigh each ingredient precisely using a digital scale.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to 500°C (932°F) naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to 500°C (932°F) naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
